Name: La Poire des Bénédictines
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pear wedge speared with cube of Roquefort cheese.
Garnish with pear wedge speared with cube of Roquefort cheese.
Review: Pear and cognac are a match made in heaven. Bénédictine adds honeyed sweetness and herbal complexity to this after-dinner cocktail.
History: Adapted from a drink promoted by Grey Goose in 2013 and originally using their La Poire vodka .
Nutrition: One serving of La Poire des Bénédictines contains 193 calories
